front.title: Publish/Subscribe over the Constrained Application Protocol (CoAP) using the Constrained RESTful Application Language (CoRAL)

abstract.t: This document explores how the Constrained RESTful Application Language (CoRAL) might be used for enabling publish/subscribe-style communication over the Constrained Application Protocol (CoAP), which allows CoAP nodes with long breaks in connectivity and/or up-time to exchange data via a publish/subscribe broker.
